shield.name: Shield
shield.description: It's a shield, there's not really anything else to it. Although it can sometimes protect you from robberies
uses: 100% chance of protecting you from a robbery
50% chance of loosing HP on robbery.

shieldhp.name: Shield's HP
shieldhp.description: The amount of hp your shield has before it breaks. It lowers when somebody attempts to rob you.

rock.name: Rock
rock.description: It's a rock. Nothing more, nothing less.

stick.name: Stick
stick.description: A stick that was torn off from a tree, stick moment
